constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 44 (Tuesday, March 9, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H1189-H1190]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MICHAEL F. DOYLE of Pennsylvania:
H.R. 1684.
[[Page H1190]]
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority on which this bill rests is
the power of Congress to limpose and collect Taxes, Duties,
Imposts and Excises, as enumerated in Article I, Section 8,
Clause 1 of the United States Constitution.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: Energy Storage Tax Incentive and Deployment Act of 2021
